籤詩版本二:
Iva neruremekedzo neruremekedzo paunopinda nekubuda, iva akavimbika uye akavimbika, uye teerera mashoko ako.
Pfungwa hadzina kujeka uye dzakanyarara, zuva rakatsvuka rakajeka riri pakati
詩意:
Hexagram iyi inomiririra mufananidzo wezuva dzvuku richipenya mudenga.
Zvose zvinofamba sezvakarongwa.
解曰: Hapana chiri mupfungwa. Mvura yematsutso yakachena. Hapana chikonzero chekukahadzika. Zvinhu zvinongoitika zvoga.
籤詩故事一:
◇Taoyuan akapika hama
Pakupera kweKumabvazuva kweHan Dynasty, nyika yakanga iri mumhirizhonga, uye mbavha dzeYellow Turban dzaikonzera mhirizhonga kwose kwose.
Liu Bei, Guan Yu naZhang Fei, vanhu vatatu vaiva nemafungiro akakwirira, vaiva nemafungiro akafanana uye vaitsamira pane mumwe nomumwe mumashoko avo nezviito nokuda kwechinangwa chokuita chinhu chikuru pamwe chete. Vakasarudza mwaka apo maruva epichisi akanga azara. Vakava shamwari dzakapika pamusoro pewaini, vakapika mhiko kudenga, vakagoverana nhamo, vakagoverana nhamo, vakagoverana zvikomborero, uye pamwe chete vakaziva pfungwa yakanaka yokumutsiridza Humambo hweHan. Vatatu vakabva vaita mhiko hama.Wakanga uri Kurume maruva emupichisi akanga ava kutumbuka.Yaizivikanwa nezita rekuti "Three Brothers in the Peach Garden".
聖意: Kuchengeteka pamba, hupfumi, hupfumi, kunetsa kwekutengeserana, kuroora, njodzi, vanofamba netsoka vachivharira minda, makonye esirika, zvipfuyo, vanhu vakashaikwa, kumatare edzimhosva, kurasikirwa, kutama, kuchengetedza, kurasikirwa nepfuma, kurwara, kumisikidza, kutumira kuguva regomo, rombo rakanaka.
